thread.section_title: Evergreen.ie Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Evergreen.ie | www.evergreen.ie
thread.title: Theresa Burton

author: Theresa Burton
title: Theresa Burton
text: I was delighted to come across Evergreen online, and see that they ship for free within the republic of Ireland. Their prices are a good few euro cheaper than the healthfood stores here in Dublin so I decided to order my shopping with them. The order took about 9 days to get to us as they decided to wait until one of the items was in stock before shipping the whole order. This was the only minus point thus 4 stars. I will probably order from them again as they stock some hard to find brands and items not usually found in the other shops.
